item.title: Conference Notes - Google Cloud Next 2019
item.description:
Google Cloud had their annul conference in April this year in San Francisco. There were a lot of cool announcements.

Here is my list of announcements that I am excited for.

item.title: Conference Notes - MLConf 2019
item.description:
On March, I attended the machine learning conferene ML Conf in NYC.

Here are links shared from the conferences:

  • Slides
  • [Book Discount (40%)](https://mlconf.com/blog/ tweet-for-a-chance-to-win-free-books-at-mlconf-nyc-this-friday/) ctwmlconfny19
  • Speaker Resources
  • Videos

Here are a list of my favorite talks.
